pages.text: The $(item)Electric Compressor/$ can generate compressed air from $(thing)IndustrialCraft 2's EU/$. By default it has an efficiency of 40%, but this can be $(ttcolor)$(t:See 'I:electricCompressorEfficiency')changed in the config/$.$(p)It behaves like a IC2 tier 1 machine, so it will explode if it receives >32 EU/t. However, you can add IC2 $(item)Transformer Upgrades/$ to allow higher voltages, as in normal IC2 machines.

The energy output in mL/tick is:$(p)  $(formula)input rate / E * 400/$$(p)where $(formula)E/$ is the efficiency.$(p)For instance, with the default efficiency of 40% and an input of 32EU/tick, the compressed air production equals $(formula)32 / 40 * 400 = 320mL/tick./$

Another factor that influences the efficiency is the machine's $(l:base_concepts/heat)heat/$. The machine needs to be cooled, as the efficiency will drop as the temperature rises, up to the point where no air is generated at all.
